meanings.definition: Uptempos: a type of fast-paced music or dance style
meanings.sent1: The dance class was full of energetic uptempos that got everyone moving.
meanings.sent2: The uptempos at the party had everyone on their feet, dancing all night.
meanings.sent3: The uptempos in the music made the kids dance so fast they almost flew!
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced to the beat of the uptempos, feeling alive and free.
meanings.sent5: The uptempos in the song were so catchy, they stayed in her head all day.

meanings.definition: Uptempos: shoes designed for athletic activities or casual wear
meanings.sent1: He laced up his new uptempos before heading out for a run.
meanings.sent2: The uptempos she wore were not only stylish but also comfortable for walking.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally wore her uptempos to the fancy dinner, but no one noticed.
meanings.sent4: His uptempos carried him swiftly through the race, like wings on his feet.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of her uptempos added a fun pop to her outfit.
